Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive

Class Route

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive.Route
public class Route extends Object
Functionality for interactive routing.

    • Route

      public Route(Point p_start_corner, int p_layer, int[] p_pen_half_width_arr, boolean[] p_layer_active_arr, int[] p_net_no_arr, int p_clearance_class, ViaRule p_via_rule, boolean p_push_enabled, int p_trace_tidy_width, int p_pull_tight_accuracy, Item p_start_item, Set<Item> p_target_set, RoutingBoard p_board, boolean p_is_stitch_mode, boolean p_with_neckdown, boolean p_via_snap_to_smd_center, boolean p_hilight_shove_failing_obstacle)
      Starts routing a connection. p_pen_half_width_arr is provided because it may be different from the half width array in p_board.rules.

  • Method Details

    • next_corner

      public boolean next_corner(FloatPoint p_corner)
      Append a line to the trace routed so far. Return true, if the route is completed by connecting to a target.

    • change_layer

      public boolean change_layer(int p_to_layer)
      Changing the layer in interactive route and inserting a via. Returns false, if changing the layer was not possible.

    • nearest_target_layer

      public int nearest_target_layer()
      Calculates the nearest layer of the nearest target item to this.layer.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics p_graphics, GraphicsContext p_graphics_context)
      Hilights the targets and draws the incomplete.
